column4: what can I do? Someone is using my ip to sign people up for spam!!?
be more specific
I receive some emails saying I violated the Terms and Agreements on a website and from someone I know on a website saying my IP address popped up on the newsletters "sent by me"
do you use static ip? I guess yes
I have no idea! I don't know what to do now.
your prob seem to quite weird...never heard of something like this
is someone like snooping on my connection and then using my ip to sign people up for newsletters?
quite possible
how is that even possible though?
but people wont do that unless someone specifically targets your IP
you mean the other person sets their ip the same as mine or something?
they can spoof your ip, right?
answer this: does your ip remain same everytimne to connect to net?
so anyone who can snoop on my connection can do that to me?
I believe so. I usually check my IP on whatismyip and it's always the same
then someone is spoofing your ip, and he is specifically targeting you, so be cautious
so there's nothing I could do now? Just contact my ISP?
thats the first step, and ask if possibly you can have dynamic ip
and I should shut off my router as well?
you dont need to do that,,,but make sure you communicate this prob to your ISP at the earliest
thank you very much!!
you're welcome dude
